text:
[Verse]
Paper planes we throw so high
Reaching for the endless sky
In our minds we start to fly
Never asking how or why

[Chorus]
Fold them tight we let them go
Watch the wind take what we know
Childhood dreams in every throw
In the breeze they dance and flow

[Verse]
Running wild across the park
Launching dreams from dawn to dark
Searching for that magic spark
Hopes and wishes hit the mark

[Chorus]
Fold them tight we let them go
Watch the wind take what we know
Childhood dreams in every throw
In the breeze they dance and flow

[Bridge]
Dreams that float just like our planes
Memories that still remains
In the sky we feel no chains
Free and true in playful lanes

[Chorus]
Fold them tight we let them go
Watch the wind take what we know
Childhood dreams in every throw
In the breeze they dance and flow
title: Paper Airplanes
